title: Getting reported for supposed hacking.
body: So I just finished a game and although I did do very well and the enemy team lost the enemy adc accused me of hacking even though I wasn't? Is there anything I should do?

replies.body: As Viper mentioned, don't sweat it.  False reports won't count against you, so you have nothing to worry about if you're playing legitimately.  If you have further concerns, though, feel free to share it with the PB community via the [PB boards.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation)  Hope that helps offer some relief!
